site.name: Right School of Motoring
site.description: Learn to drive with confidence. Professional driving instructor offering manual and automatic lessons in Maidenhead. High pass rates, patient instruction, competitive prices.

hero.title: Learn to Drive with Confidence
hero.subtitle: Professional driving instruction with high pass rates

whyChooseMe.title: Why Choose Me?
whyChooseMe.subtitle: Experience the difference with a professional, patient, and personalized driving instructor

items.title: High Pass Rate
items.content: 95% first-time pass rate with proven teaching methods and comprehensive test preparation

items.title: Flexible Scheduling
items.content: Lessons available 7 days a week, including evenings and weekends to fit your busy lifestyle

items.title: Patient Instruction
items.content: Calm, encouraging approach that builds confidence and reduces anxiety for nervous learners

items.title: Competitive Prices
items.content: Excellent value for money with transparent pricing and no hidden fees or extra charges
Passed first time with only 2 minor faults! The patient teaching style really helped build my confidence behind the wheel.
My daughter was so nervous about driving, but the calm approach made all the difference. Highly recommend!
Flexible scheduling was perfect for my busy work life. Professional instruction that got me through my test quickly.
Clear explanations and plenty of practice made learning to drive enjoyable. Passed with confidence!
